puzzles.name: Shadow Whisper
puzzles.description: Look closely at the candle shadows together they reveal the secret word.

hints.hintText: Count the Candles on the center table first

puzzles.name: Whisperlight Count
puzzles.description: In this dim room, the candles gather in two places on the table and at the hearth. Count each group in order to reveal the code.

hints.hintText: Swap the portraits so the plaques climb from the oldest year to the newest.

puzzles.name: Haunted Arrangement
puzzles.description: Some of the portraits are not where they should be… how many stare from the wrong place?

hints.hintText: Only one mirror shows motion after the ballroom goes quiet.

puzzles.name: Haunted Reflection
puzzles.description: Which wall contains the smallest painting

hints.hintText: You can find me in oceans, clouds, and your morning cup.

puzzles.name: The Spilled Riddle
puzzles.description: I can crash with power or drip in peace, in endless forms, I never cease. What am I?

hints.hintText: They sit under mirrors and each has its own drain — count the basins, not the reflections.

puzzles.name: Mirror Riddle
puzzles.description: I sit beneath two mirrors' glare, two mouths that drink but never share. They catch the water, drain the blue—how many mouths belong to you?

hints.hintText: Count the Candles on the center table first
Swap the portraits so the plaques climb from the oldest year to the newest.
Only one mirror shows motion after the ballroom goes quiet.
You can find me in oceans, clouds, and your morning cup.
They sit under mirrors and each has its own drain — count the basins, not the reflections.
